item.description:
Movie Screening: Beautiful Losers at the RISD Museum, Chace Center - Michael P. Metcalf Auditorium

Posted as an FYI - Screening will be held in conjunction with the September Gallery Night. The Metcalf Auditorium is located on the First Floor of the RISD Museum Chace Center.

Filmmaker Aaron Rose's documentary explores the vibrant world of a group of underground artists involved in graffiti, skateboarding, and music in New York during the early 1990's. What begins as outsider art soon influences fashion, film, and pop culture. Co-sponsored by Cable Car Cinema.

Please RSVP so others can join you, and will know who wants to go!
item.how_to_find_us: Posted as an FYI - Please RSVP if you want to go so others can join you!
item.name: Movie Screening: Beautiful Losers - RISD Museum
